items.sentence: I think it would be better if we didn\'t tell Tom the truth.
There\'s something mysterious about the way Tom is behaving.
Tom used to go to school by bicycle, but now he goes by bus.
Your mother must\'ve been very beautiful when she was young.
I wonder whether or not Tom could talk Mary into doing that.
I wonder whether or not Tom is actually in Boston right now.
When I got home, I realized one of my suitcases was missing.
This university was founded by Tom Jackson thirty years ago.
I wish I had time to go home and change into something else.
Mary is much closer to her father than she is to her mother.
Tom wonders if he\'ll be able to say goodbye without crying.
I was surprised when Tom told me he didn\'t have to do that.
I had no idea that Tom was planning to tell Mary to do that.
I had such a crush on Mary when I was in junior high school.
Tom told Mary that he would be spending Christmas in Boston.
Tom never thought Mary would actually graduate from college.
Tom offered Mary thirty dollars to help him clean his house.
Tom says that he\'s going to read the report this afternoon.
Tom sent money to help Mary pay for her mother\'s operation.
I immediately ran downstairs to find out what was happening.
